name: noname (teddyjack)
description:
This is not a complete game and my first networking project(Lan Only)

All Sprites and Backgrounds are placeholders

Concept: Multiplayer Game + Destroying Backgrounds

Controls:

Up = Up
Down = Down
Left = Left
Right = Right
Jump = Space
Booster = Z
Shoot = X
Charged Shot = A
Rope = C
Small Angle Shift = Control + Up/Down
Large Angle Shift = Shift + Up/Down
Switch Weapon Set 1 = 1 + Any arrow keys
Switch Weapon Set 2 = 3 + Any arrow keys
Escape: Exit in game
